name: Comets Wake
description: Come join the adventure of Comets Wake. Explore vast archipelagos of floating islands with infinite variety. Find waterfalls, lava lakes, towers, ruins, giant mushrooms, and more! Choose from a huge array of weapons from guns to swords, or even a mage staff.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 8 Processor: Core i-5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 350 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Core i-7 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1070 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 350 MB available space
